summary: The Military Housing Performance Insight Act (H.R. 5422) amends Title 10 of the United States Code to modify the semi-annual report on privatized military housing. The bill requires the Department of Defense to include data overviews, assessments of housing data usage, explanations of customer satisfaction data limitations, and breakdowns by installation and project in its reports. It also mandates public reporting of the semi-annual report on a publicly available website and changes the report's frequency and structure.
